definitions.definition: Any substance or drug that reduces pain , induces sleep and may alter mood or behaviour ; in some contexts, especially in reference to the opiates -and- opioids class, especially in reference to illegal drugs , and often both.
Any type of numbing or soothing drug.

main_definition: ( pharmacology ) Any substance or drug that reduces pain , induces sleep and may alter mood or behaviour ; in some contexts, especially in reference to the opiates -and- opioids class, especially in reference to illegal drugs , and often both.
secondary_definitions: Any type of numbing or soothing drug.
